message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a little too greedy for me. How about we meet closer to the middle? This offer will net you more than waiting.
I see you're willing to meet closer to the middle. How about we try 57-43?
We're running out of time, and this back and forth isn't helping anyone. I'm offering you a deal where we both benefit before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I understand your concern about time, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about 56-44?
This is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day. Any more time wasted and inflation will hurt us both.
